issue.title: [Python] Address docstrings in Schema
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15431](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15431). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Ensure all docstrings of classes and methods in /docs/python/generated/pyarrow.Schema.html have an `Examples` section.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15431?focusedCommentId=17518951) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12783
